Boring iPhones & Digital Death

Sep 15, 2016

Just how boring is the iPhone?

We discuss just how boring is Apple? Why is there this expectation around innovation? Is the same expectation placed on Samsung, Microsoft, Google, Samsung? Whatâ€™s the last bit of tech that actually made you excited? And should tech make you excited or are our lives just that sad?

What does dying look like today?

In todays digital age what exactly death means today. Should we build computers that forget? Could we set timelines for data to die or fade? What happens when an algorithm has access to our memories?
